name: GRC Rally Challenge
description:
A simple top-down rally like game with a couple of cars and tracks. I'm a bit sad, because I don't have time, to finish it until the deadline, but give it a try. You can race, and win new cars, but the position at the end ( after 4th track ) is buggy =/

Important note: You must touch all checkpoints in order ( bright lines ), before you can finish a level.

However hope you'd like it :)

Controls:

  • Up: Accelerate
  • Down: Brake
  • Left: Turn left
  • Right: Turn right
  • (A) : X
  • (B): Y/Z

4 tracks, 4 ( 3 unlockable ) cars. Position at the end is buggy

Musics from: http://www.playonloop.com/
